content: easy peasy linen stitch washcloth by june nemeth materials ● 100 yds worsted weight cotton sample used queensland collection coastal cotton coral reef ● size g hook ● tapestry needle to sew in ends abbreviations chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet skip = skip space = space pattern ch36 or any multiple of 2 row 1 single_crochet in the 4th chain from hook *ch1 skip next chain single_crochet in next repeat from * to end ch2 turn row 2 *single_crochet in first chain-1 space ch1 skip next single_crochet repeat from * to last single_crochet single_crochet in the last chain space created when you single_crochet in the 4th chain at the beginning ch2 turn row 3 *single_crochet in next chain-1 space ch1 skip next single_crochet repeat from * to last single_crochet single_crochet in chain-2 space ch2 turn repeat row 3 until piece measures 7 or your desired length fasten_off and sew in your ends enjoy
